===========
::English::
===========
Interface language: Spanish, Multi
Platform: Windows All
License: Shareware

Nero Recode - allows you to copy non copy-protected DVD videos to DVD allows you to archive the content. If the video source of more than 4.7 GB, compressed in this way, so that fits in a single layer DVD without compromising quality. You can also delete unwanted material displayed on the DVD-source during the copy process (including subtitles or audio tracks), thus freeing space for additional records or making the best video quality.

Nero Recode is the best software that is designed to import, recoding (or compressing) and burning a video DVD. In many respects, Nero Recode repeatedly Elby CloneDVD2 and DVD Shrink. But besides the functions reavtoringa DVD also includes an encoding tool MP4 (x263/NeroDigital and x264/AVC).

Features:
* Nero Recode 4.8.10400.3.100 taken from the official release of Nero Suite 10.5.10500 Multimedia
* Activation and registration is not required
